inclusion.criterion: Ability to consent to and participate in the study and follow study procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients will undergo a physical examination, baseline blood tests including measurement of lipase and/or amylase, liver biochemistry and fasting lipid profile.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants will also have a baseline abdominal ultrasound to confirm normal anatomy and absence of cholelithiasis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: In weeks 1, 2, 3 and 6 will have blood tests (full blood count and liver biochemistry) performed at a local clinic
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: In weeks 4, 8 and 12 the participant will attend clinic with the investigator for a medical history, clinical examination and review of blood tests (blood count and liver enzymes)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients diagnosed with IBD, treated previously with thiopurines, and ceased treatment due to suspected thiopurine-induced pancreatitis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous severe pancreatitis requiring prolonged hospital admission or intensive care involvement, or Ranson's criteria ≥ 3
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
